--Scryed--

The pod that Hot Rod was carrying buzzed for a second or two, and 
it's status lights blinked several times, before returning to steady 
full power. The release clasps click open, and the stasis pod's door 
begins to open with a hissing noise. Unfortunately, the door hits 
and obstuction, and needs to be repostitioned before the bot inside 
may exit.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: Slag! slagslagslagslag!!!!! This guy is so damaged it 
would 
> barely able to hold out if he got out right now! I'll try to hold 
him 
> off for a few cycles...
> 
> He tapped a few keys and hoped that the arrival of this new one 
would 
> be delayed until they had the time to make sure he is in a good 
state.
>

that

way
